knimeNode.name: CSV Writer
knimeNode.shortDescription: saves a data table into a file in csv (comma separated value) format.

fullDescription.intro: This node writes out the data table coming in through its input port into a file. The attribute values will be separated by commas. In the configuration dialog of the node, enter a valid destination filename and set a checkmark, if the column headers should be written out (in the first line), and each line should be preceeded by the row ID. Also, a pattern can be specified that should be written out, when an attribute value is missing.
